title: SHAP gives exception with sklearn randomforestclassifier and gradientboostclassifier
body:
Hi ,
I have trained randomforestclassifier on a dataset and when I pass this model to shap tree explainer, I get the following error:
Please provide  suggestions.

NameError                                 Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-6-90ae01161d53> in <module>()
----> 1 explainer = shap.TreeExplainer(model)
      2 shap_values = explainer.shap_values(X_train)

E:\Anaconda\lib\site-packages\shap\explainers\tree.py in __init__(self, model, data, model_output, feature_dependence, **kwargs)
    108 
    109             scale = len(model.estimators_) * model.learning_rate
--> 110             self.trees = [Tree(e.tree_, scaling=scale) for e in model.estimators_[:,0]]
    111             self.less_than_or_equal = True
    112         elif str(type(model)).endswith("xgboost.core.Booster'>"):

E:\Anaconda\lib\site-packages\shap\explainers\tree.py in <listcomp>(.0)
    108 
    109             scale = len(model.estimators_) * model.learning_rate
--> 110             self.trees = [Tree(e.tree_, scaling=scale) for e in model.estimators_[:,0]]
    111             self.less_than_or_equal = True
    112         elif str(type(model)).endswith("xgboost.core.Booster'>"):

E:\Anaconda\lib\site-packages\shap\explainers\tree.py in __init__(self, tree, normalize, scaling)
    564 
    565             # we compute the expectations to make sure they follow the SHAP logic
--> 566             self.max_depth = _cext.compute_expectations(
    567                 self.children_left, self.children_right, self.node_sample_weight,
    568                 self.values

**NameError: name '_cext' is not defined**
